about_the_game: CarX Street Tuners is an absolutely new angle to look at drift. CarX Street Tuners pack is all you need to create new and unique designs: more fun and less restriction, more aggression and feel of modern times. You make the rules. Not enough for you? No problem! Pick any from 3 ready-made liveries and show everyone your true colors.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4590 or AMD Ryzen3 1200
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB (GeForce 950GT / AMD R9 270)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 9.0с
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I5-8300H @ 2.30GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1050GTX 4 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 9.0с
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
